title: Linotype's August 2005 LinoLetter — Fonts for Sports and Groovy Music
content:
============================================================

! Welcome to the August issue of the LinoLetter !

INTRODUCTION:  
Kicking off this edition of the LinoLetter is our new Sport Value  
Pack, an outstanding font collection with an ideal price. This monthís  
font spotlight falls on one of our psychedelic favorites, the classic  
rock evoking Mojo. Additionally, weíd like to present another design  
close to our hearts: the sketch font Linotype Ego. Rounding out the  
news is a link to the DecodeUnicode.org website, a worldwide wiki  
aiming to classify the entire range of Unicode characters.

Have fonts of fun!

_To read the entire issue, goto:_ [http://www.linotype.com/8-38-8-18774/issue200508.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126074701/http:/www.linotype.com/8-38-8-18774/issue200508.html)

============================================================
author: Miss Tiffany : 8 August, 2005 - 8:40am
